# Extendicare Maintenance Inspection Checklist## Equipment: Thermostats/Temperature Controllers### LEGEND/KEY
- **W** – Weekly
- **M** – Monthly
- **Q** – Quarterly
- **S** – Semi-Annual
- **A** – Annual
- **O** – Ok
- **R** – Repair
- **N** – Replace| W | M | Q | S | A | Item | CHECKS |
|---|---|---|---|---|------|--------|
| X |   |   |   |   | 1    | Check operation to ensure that they:  |
|   |   |   |   |   |      | - control operating devices              |
|   |   |   |   |   |      | - are calibrated (pneumatic controls). |
| X |   |   |   |   | 2    | Protective covers are in place and secure. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 3    | Remove cover and clean lint and dust from inner compartment. |
|   |   |   |   |   |      | (Excessive air pressure can damage delicate components; be careful).

|
| X |   |   |   |   | 3    | Remove cover and clean lint and dust from inner compartment. |
|   |   |   |   |   |      | (Excessive air pressure can damage delicate components; be careful). |### Monthly Schedule
